title: Term Index - Kenneth Reitz
description: Kenneth Reitz - Creator of Requests and Certifi, trusted by millions of developers worldwide. Thoughts on technology, philosophy, and building software for humans.
author: Kenneth Reitz
text_content: Term Index Book-style index — 1633 key terms and concepts with 8661 total references across the digital garden. An alphabetical index of significant terms, concepts, and ideas appearing throughout the essays. Like the back of a book, this maps where each concept is discussed, weighted by frequency and importance.
